body_html:
I got the similar error when i install tensorflow without CUDA

ERROR: /home/user/.cache/bazel/_bazel_user/539629cca61901b68a2179672fed247c/external/boringssl/BUILD:115:1: C++ compilation of rule '@boringssl//:crypto' failed (Exit 1)
external/boringssl/linux-x86_64/crypto/fipsmodule/p256-x86_64-asm.S: Assembler messages:
external/boringssl/linux-x86_64/crypto/fipsmodule/p256-x86_64-asm.S:638: Error: suffix or operands invalid for vpxor' external/boringssl/linux-x86_64/crypto/fipsmodule/p256-x86_64-asm.S:639: Error: suffix or operands invalid for vpxor'
external/boringssl/linux-x86_64/crypto/fipsmodule/p256-x86_64-asm.S:640: Error: suffix or operands invalid for `vpxor'
...

OS:Alibaba Group Enterprise Linux Server release 6.2 (DogTag)
Tensorflow installed from source.
Tensorflow version: 1.10
Python version: 3.6
Bazel version: 0.15.2
GCC version: 7.2.0
Command:
bazel build --config=opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

Thanks!

body:
I got the similar error when i install tensorflow without CUDA

ERROR: /home/user/.cache/bazel/_bazel_user/539629cca61901b68a2179672fed247c/external/boringssl/BUILD:115:1: C++ compilation of rule '@boringssl//:crypto' failed (Exit 1)
external/boringssl/linux-x86_64/crypto/fipsmodule/p256-x86_64-asm.S: Assembler messages:
external/boringssl/linux-x86_64/crypto/fipsmodule/p256-x86_64-asm.S:638: Error: suffix or operands invalid for `vpxor'
external/boringssl/linux-x86_64/crypto/fipsmodule/p256-x86_64-asm.S:639: Error: suffix or operands invalid for `vpxor'
external/boringssl/linux-x86_64/crypto/fipsmodule/p256-x86_64-asm.S:640: Error: suffix or operands invalid for `vpxor'
...

OS:Alibaba Group Enterprise Linux Server release 6.2 (DogTag)
Tensorflow installed from source.
Tensorflow version: 1.10
Python version: 3.6
Bazel version: 0.15.2
GCC version: 7.2.0
Command:
bazel build --config=opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

Thanks!
